events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience detailed in your resume.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted focusing on your software development experience and familiarity with our technical stack.
We received your positive response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 14:00 UTC, where you will meet with our senior developers to discuss your coding skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the team with your problem-solving abilities and understanding of software architecture.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on 2024-05-15 to discuss company culture, benefits, and any questions you might have.
The HR interview went very well, with positive feedback regarding your alignment with the companyâ€™s mission and values.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed your enthusiasm to join our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including account setups, introduction meetings, and training sessions to help you integrate with our engineering teams.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and closed with your first day as a full-time Software Engineer now confirmed.
